statements: SELECT * FROM promotions
SELECT promotion_name, discount_rate FROM promotions WHERE discount_rate > 0.10
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT promotion_id, promotion_name FROM promotions ORDER BY promotion_name DESC
SELECT promotion_name, discount_rate FROM promotions WHERE start_date >= '2022-06-01'
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE promotion_name = 'Summer Sale'
SELECT promotion_id, promotion_name, discount_rate FROM promotions WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-07-01'
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE discount_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT promotion_name, discount_rate FROM promotions ORDER BY promotion_name ASC
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE end_date > '2022-08-31' LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT start_date, end_date, discount_rate FROM promotions WHERE discount_rate > 0.5;
SELECT id, product_id, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT id, discount_rate, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE discount_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, discount_rate FROM promotions WHERE end_date > '2022-10-31' AND discount_rate < 0.5 ORDER BY discount_rate ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_amount_spent FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount_spent > 1000;
SELECT p.id, pr.product_id, pr.purchase_amount FROM promotions p LEFT JOIN purchases pr ON p.id = pr.id WHERE p.discount_rate >= 0.2;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_promotions, AVG(discount_rate) AS avg_discount FROM promotions;
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE discount_amount > 20.00;
SELECT id, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM customer_purchase WHERE total_amount < 100.00;
SELECT feedback_id, satisfaction_score FROM purchase_feedback WHERE satisfaction_score >= 4;
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, total_amount, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase;
SELECT id, discount_amount, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE discount_amount > 50 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM promotions JOIN customer_purchase ON promotions.id = customer_purchase.purchase_id WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customer_purchase GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT feedback_id, purchase_id, satisfaction_score, feedback_text FROM purchase_feedback WHERE satisfaction_score < 3 ORDER BY satisfaction_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM promotions JOIN purchase_feedback ON promotions.id = purchase_feedback.purchase_id WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT products.name, promotions.discount_amount FROM products JOIN promotions ON products.product_id = promotions.product_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, country FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT discount_name, discount_amount, start_date, end_date FROM discounts WHERE end_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA';
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, category, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY stock_quantity ASC;
